reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: I'm just a DIY homeowner who have over the years taught myself electrical stuff via books in the old days -- and now via YouTube. I purchased the subject Lutron double pack. I used both switches to replace existing single-pole switches. I used one switch to replace a cheap GE-brand LED dimmer switch which I had purchased at Wal-Mart a couple years ago. That cheap GE switch had a problem of not being able to be turned back on if it had been turned off in a low-dimmed state. This Lutron switch solved that problem with its LED Dimming-Range Adjustment Lever. (Note: The lever must be adjusted prior to putting the switch cover-plate back over the switch.) 5‚òÜ+ rating in my book. I have used Lutron electrical switches in the past and they have always proved to be reliable in my experience. Highly recommended. .
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.title: Lutron LED Dimming-Range Adjustment Lever is a Great Feature

reviews.title: Great dimmer for LEDs!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: I've used all different kinds of these gorgeous and highly adjustable Lutron switches (primarily exactly like these) for 25 years. And that's just about how long they last, which is a disappointment to me because the old-fashioned narrow flip on/off switches last as long as the building stands. But these new Lutron switches are built (somehow) to accommodate LED, halogen and incandescent light, all of which I have in my home. I do have a light bar that we replaced with LED bulbs and these new LED switches allowed a mind-numbing flicker of light that is so bad that I'm replacing the energy-sucking, hot incandescent bulbs there. I can only presume that the issue had something to do with the light bar of 8 bulbs but maybe it's the switch too. So caution. In replacing the worn-out, twist-prone Lutron switches with their new equally-adjustable counterparts, we've found that these switches are hard to fit into the electric boxes that were built 25-years ago. Fortunately Lutron has put sort of wings on the sides that you can break off to help you wedge the switch into the box. The problem really comes in when you have a 2-3-4 switch panel. We found it very hard to get these switches to fit in in those 2-3-4 switch panels and even harder to keep from breaking the lovely cover for the boxes. Perhaps that is why Lutron's 4-swich unit has no screws on it since aligning screws with the 4-panel is guaranteed breakage. We decided instead, since we couldn't figure out from the Amazon posting how the screwless unit was attached, that we would just glue the old cover back together and ignore the crack it left. You know these Lutron switches are about to go when (consistently) they begin to shift sideways and the contact points become erratic. Don't wait to replace; it will not stay the same or get better. It's not something you did; it's a flaw of the switch. ... But they sure make the house feel nice and for a person who is all about light, it's odd and intensity, in the end, Lutron is a dream come true..
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.title: Some installation problems and a 20-year lifespan

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: This dimmer switch main package and description states it dims LED bulbs but once I installed the switch I found that it does not dim G4 LED bulbs. Wasted a lot of time and full price of the switch. The instructions inside the package states it only works with screw in type LED bulbs. That information should have been on the product description as it is very important. Very disappointed with this product and the poor description that does not indicate that it only works with certain types of dimmable LED bulbs.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.title: Disappointed. Does not dim G4 LED bulbs

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: This switch can be used as either a 3-way switch or a conventional single way switch. By convention, single way switches operate so that one presses the toggle on top to turn the light on and on the bottom to turn it off. If you follow the enclosed instructions for installing this switch as a single way unit you will get the reverse behavior. I used the user message board to see how to fix this even though I knew what to do from experience. The response I got was contradictory from two different "expert" responders. One said I should follow the instructions and I must have installed the switch upside down (this is hard to do if you are paying any attention) and the other (the correct response) was to use the red/white striped wire in place of the solid red wire as the instructions direct. This last response is the correct one. The switch works fine. Just make sure you do not follow the instructions if you want correct operation for a one way installation.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2022
reviews.title: Product great! Instructions terrible!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: This product is great. You should know, however, that only one dimmer can be installed in the circuit. I put this dimmer switch on both sides of the 3 way circuit and the light continuously flickered. I had to remove one dimmer and replace it with a standard 3way switch for the dimmer function to work properly. That was okay with me and now the dimmer function works great!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.title: ONLY ONE Work with my LED lights

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: I bought 2x of DVCL-153P-2-WH. They come with a little bag of wire nuts - both were opened and one of them was missing nuts. Thought that was strange. I am using these in a single pole application where I'm replacing existing switches. Installation was easy but they don't work. Hot to red, hot to black, ground to green. Nothing. Tried switching the hot (black) wires. Nothing. One is wired to LED downlights (which specifically listed these switches as compatible); the other is wired to LED hanging fixtures. Neither work. Installation is too easy (screw on wire nuts to 3 wires) to have messed it up... but just in case I've checked and double checked, and even switched the hot on one. Worth noting the ceiling fan on the same circuit, which I wired at the same time, works (with a normal cheap toggle switch). So it's either the installation, or the dimmers - and like I said, installation is very easy.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
reviews.title: Package opened; product does not seem to work

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: Huge upgrade. Like this a lot, bright lights for when you need to see (e.g. cleaning) and otherwise you can dim as you please. No humming or flicking. The only thing why I had to return some of the switches is that they require more space (more deepness) and I did not want to put in the extra work. Return of those was easy and refund came fast. Remember to order the cover extra!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH, White (2-Pack)
reviews.text: Pros: -Does the job. Cons: -Razor-thin dimming slider is hard to grasp, unpleasant to the touch. -Switches sound and feel hollow when flicked. Cheap feeling. -Fins are thin. Screws heads can easily warp and go past the screw holes if you overdrive them. I had to insert washers as backing. Overall: Not enough quality for the price. Recommendation: I went with a Pass & Seymour Radiant dimmer instead. Has none of the cons above.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on August 31, 2022
reviews.title: Does the job but feels cheap for the price
